animeDescription: Hinata is very good at drawing and falls in love with his classmate, Shigure; however, Hinata is not good at talking to people, so he keeps his feelings in his imagination and drawings. Then, Shigure's family decides to move to another town. On the day of their move, Hinata says to himself, "I must tell her my feelings!" and starts to chase after the train which is taking Shigure away.  (Source: MAL)
animeStaff: [['Ishida Hiroyasu', ['Director', 'Screenplay']], ['Iwanami Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Koyama Yasumasa', ['Sound Effects']], ['Arai Youjirou', ['Character Design', 'Animation Director']]]
